name: Ten Blast
description:
A super fun unique original number puzzle game - Ten Blast is coming!

Ten Blast is a brand new number puzzle game which is designed by KIWI FUN GAMES. Our team created lots of special points in this game. It is challenging and makes you relax especially after a work day, solving a puzzle every day will improve your reflexes and hand-eye coordination.

We design lots of special levels in it, you should complete different targets while blasting numbers. There are so many interesting designs waiting for you to discover and you won‘t stop playing this super addictive and relaxing puzzle game.

Are you ready to relax your mind and complete this free game Ten Blast? Download and enjoy it now! : ) If you have any great ideas you want to share with us, you can connect us by emailing feedback@kiwifungames.com.

HOW TO PLAY
- Double click to blast the same numbers(4-4, 9-9 etc) or pairs that added up to 10(4-6, 3-7 etc).
- The pairs can be blasted vertically, horizontally even diagonally when there is no barrier between them.
- The goal is to complete the target upon the board.
- Using various props can help you pass the level quickly.
